name: JSON.ArrayFromList CFs
snippet:
<fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList">
	<CustomFunction id="65" functionArity="1" visible="True" parameters="theList" name="JSON.ArrayFromList">
		<Calculation><![CDATA[If ( IsEmpty ( theList ) ; "[]" ; "[\"" & Substitute ( theList ; ¶ ; "\",\"" ) & "\"]" )]]></Calculation>
	</CustomFunction>
	<CustomFunction id="76" functionArity="1" visible="True" parameters="theList" name="JSON.ArrayFromList_objects">
		<Calculation><![CDATA[If ( IsEmpty ( theList ) ; "[]" ; "[" & Substitute ( theList ; ¶ ; "," ) & "]" )]]></Calculation>
	</CustomFunction>
</fmxmlsnippet>
description: Custom function that make it easy to convert a FM list to JSON Array
